name: Heroes of action
description:
Join the super hero squad club and crush the obstacles along the way to freedom and justice!
Unlock several smashing heroes and action figures along the way.
A truly cool arcade game with the super heroes we love and want to be.

Simple one touch game and there is nothing else much to it beside for you to time every punch exactly right or you will hit the rich wall and fail the mission.

Unlock all super heroes and compete with players from all over the world on the highscore champion hall of all time list.
